Definition: Unique identifier linking the code status event to a specific hospitalization in the CLIF database.
The date and time when the specific code status was initiated.
The name/description of the code status.
Permissible VAlues: Free text to describe the code status.

Definition: Categorical variable specifying the code status during the hospitalization.
Permissible VAlues: E.g., DNR, UDNR, DNR/DNI, Full, Presume Full, Other
